price: Muhakkak ki âhirete iman etmeyenler doğru yoldan sapanlardır.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
